title: If I hear adhan in moving car Must I go to the masjid to pray in congregation #Assim assim al hakeem
transcript: if you're in a driving car and you hear the other uh do you still have to go to the Masjid and train congregation if you're in a moving car if you are in a moving car and you're not traveling you are are within the city and you hear the aan you have to pray in the Masjid whether it's this Masjid you heard the aan from or if you time your arrival to a specific place to to pray at that Masjid you are in the city so you have to pray wherever you are because you are driving you heard the aan
